name: FlagStand
type: class
memorycategory: BaseParts
summary: |
  The FlagStand object helps you make 'capture the flag' style games.
description: |
  The Class.Flag and Class.FlagStand objects allow you to make 'Capture the
  Flag' style games quickly.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Part
descendants: []
tags:
  - Deprecated
deprecationmessage: |
  The FlagStand and Flag are deprecated objects that were used to make 'capture
  the flag' style games. Developers are advised to design their own systems
  which will be more flexible and reliable.
properties:
  - name: FlagStand.TeamColor
    summary: |
      The Team that owns the Class.FlagStand. Corresponds with the TeamColors
      in the Class.Teams service.
    description: |
      The Team that owns the Class.FlagStand. Corresponds with the TeamColors
      in the Class.Teams service.

      The Class.Flag and Class.FlagStand objects were created to allow
      developers to make 'capture the flag' style games quickly.
    codesamples: []
    type: BrickColor
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: |

      should not be used in new work.

    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:

methods: []
events:
  - name: FlagStand.FlagCaptured
    summary: |
      Fires when a player bearing an opposing flag, and having the same
      Class.Player.TeamColor as the stand, touches the Class.FlagStand.
    description: |
      This event fires when a player bearing an opposing flag, and having the
      same Class.Player.TeamColor as the stand, touches the Class.FlagStand.

      The Class.Flag and Class.FlagStand objects were created to allow
      developers to make 'capture the flag' style games quickly.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: player
        type: Instance
        default:
        summary: ''
